data.title: Where Is Duke University?
data.meta_description: Check out this map to learn where Duke University is and the type of location setting the school is in. Also, get information about the area around Duke.
data.text:
View a map that shows where Duke University is, and find out more about the surrounding neighborhood. Is the campus close enough to home for your liking? Be sure you can enjoy the area around the campus, too.

Why Location Matters

You won't spend all of your on campus when you attend the school. You should know if the area arround Duke is in a safe neighborhood and how close it is to other cities in the general area.

Duke University Location and Map

Duke University is a private not-for-profit institution situated in Durham, North Carolina. The surrounding area of the school is a good match for students who enjoy city life.

Location of Duke University

Contact details for Duke are given below.
